add.help: Add a value to the object cache.

decr.help: Decrement a value in the object cache.

delete.help: Remove a value from the object cache.

get.help: Get a value from the object cache.

incr.help: Increment a value in the object cache.

replace.help: Replace an existing value in the object cache.

set.help: Set a value to the object cache.

type.help: Attempts to determine which object cache is being used.

add.help: Add capabilities to a given role.

list.help: List capabilities for a given role.

remove.help: Remove capabilities from a given role.

cmd_dump.help: Dump the list of installed commands, as JSON.

info.help: Print various data about the CLI environment.

param_dump.help: Dump the list of global parameters, as JSON.

count.help: Count comments, on whole blog or on a given post.

install.help: Create the WordPress tables in the database.

is_installed.help: Determine if the WordPress tables are installed.

multisite_convert.help: Transform a single-site install into a multi-site install.

core.help: Download, install, update and otherwise manage WordPress proper.

cli.help: Open a mysql console using the WordPress credentials.

create.help: Create the database, as specified in wp-config.php

export.help: Exports the database to a file or to STDOUT.

import.help: Import database from a file or from STDIN.

query.help: Execute a query against the database.

reset.help: Remove all tables from the database.

eval.help: Execute arbitrary PHP code after loading WordPress.

eval_file.help: Load and execute a PHP file after loading WordPress.

export.help: Export content to a WXR file.

import.help: Import content from a WXR file.
Create attachments from local files or from URLs.

add_post.help: Add a post as a menu item

add_term.help: Add a taxonomy term as a menu item

delete.help: Delete one or more items from a menu

list.help: Get a list of items associated with a menu

item.help: List, add, and delete items associated with a menu

assign.help: Assign a location to a menu

list.help: List locations for the current theme.

remove.help: Remove a location from a menu

location.help: Manage a menu's assignment to locations.

menu.help: List, create, assign, and delete menus

is_installed.help: Check if the plugin is installed.

path.help: Get the path to a plugin or to the plugin directory.

status.help: See the status of one or all plugins.

edit.help: Launch system editor to edit post content.

get.help: Get a post's content by ID.

reset.help: Reset any default role to default capabilities.

_s.help: Generate starter code for a theme.

plugin.help: Generate starter code for a plugin.

plugin_tests.help: Generate files needed for running PHPUnit tests.

post_type.help: Generate PHP code for registering a custom post type.

taxonomy.help: Generate PHP code for registering a custom taxonomy.

scaffold.help: Generate code for post types, taxonomies, etc.

create.help: Create a site in a multisite install.

delete.help: Delete a site in a multisite install.

empty.help: Empty a site of its content (posts, comments, and terms).

list.help: List all sites in a multisite install.

add.help: Grant super-admin privileges to one or more users.

list.help: Show a list of users with super-admin capabilities.

remove.help: Revoke super-admin privileges to one or more users.

super_admin.help: List, add, and remove super admins from a network.

disable.help: Disable a theme in a multisite install.

enable.help: Enable a theme in a multisite install.

is_installed.help: Check if the theme is installed.

path.help: Get the path to a theme or to the theme directory.

status.help: See the status of one or all themes.

set.help: Set a transient value. <expiration> is the time until expiration, in seconds.

type.help: See whether the transients API is using an object cache or the options table.

add_cap.help: Add a capability for a user.

add_role.help: Add a role for a user.

delete.help: Delete one or more users from the current site.

import_csv.help: Import users from a CSV file.

set_role.help: Set the user role (for a particular blog).

add.help: Add a widget to a sidebar.

deactivate.help: Deactivate one or more widgets from an active sidebar.

delete.help: Delete one or more widgets from a sidebar.

list.help: List widgets associated with a sidebar.

move.help: Move a widget from one position on a sidebar to another.
